SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include PPL, DPD, GLS, Zásilkovna, and Balíkovna (Česká pošta). PRICING: Standard delivery costs range from 49 Kč (PPL Parcel Shop/Box) to 99 Kč (Home Delivery). Free shipping is available for orders over 2000 Kč. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 30 Kč applies. DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery time for all options is 1-2 business days. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Free shipping threshold at 2000 Kč. Free personal pickup at their warehouse in Roudné. A wide range of common Czech carriers is available. No express or weekend delivery options are mentioned. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. All costs, providers, and delivery times are explicitly stated and easy to understand, making for a high-quality user experience.
